com.facebook.stats

Class FastGaugeCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.stats.FastGaugeCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>, GaugeCounter

    public class FastGaugeCounter
extends Object
implements GaugeCounter
    Fast implementation of GaugeCounter that may give slightly inaccurate values in certain race conditions, but should produce close to accurate results in the long run.

    • Constructor Summary

      • merge

        public GaugeCounter merge(GaugeCounter counter)
        Description copied from interface: EventCounterIf
        Produces a merged counter that spans the range of both counters and contains the sum value. guarantees that the underlying implementation will be the same as the LHS (Composite, single)
        Specified by:
        merge in interface EventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>
        Parameters:
        counter - : counter to merge with. Merge implementation behavior is not defined if the contents of the input counter are modified; the resulting counter returned may be invalid or a ConcurrentModificationException may be thrown, depending.
        Returns:
        new EventCounter resulting from merging this and counter
